title: Phase 1: CanvasView.vue Refactoring - Extract Composables
description:
Successfully extracted 6 composables from CanvasView.vue (~2,225 lines):
- useCanvasControls (~475 lines) - Zoom, display toggles, sections, auto-arrange
- useCanvasContextMenus (~550 lines) - Context menus, alignment, distribution, group modals
- useCanvasDragDrop (~400 lines) - Drag/drop handlers, section containment
- useCanvasResize (~350 lines) - Resize state, handlers, dimension changes
- useCanvasEdges (~200 lines) - Edge syncing, connection handlers
- useCanvasNodes (~250 lines) - Node syncing, selection management

Next: Integrate composables into CanvasView.vue to reduce from ~4,082 lines to ~1,800 lines
